description:
An insulated vest for mountaineers, backcountry skiers and all-season hikers who want to keep moving through unpredictable conditions. Its highly breathable VerticalX™ SuperStrand insulation vents heat and moisture when you're working hard, but shelters your core when the action is paused. The microlight shell is weather-resistant and offers good stretch to accommodate reaching or powering up steep skin tracks.

  • Ultralight 12-denier ripstop nylon shell has movement mirroring stretch
  • VerticalX™ SuperStrand insulation has loft without bulk, like down, but maintains warmth when wet
  • Zippered handwarmer pockets keep essentials secure
  • Left hand pocket doubles as stuff sack
  • Low-Pro™ elastic binding at arm holes and hem seal out drafts
name: Outdoor Research SuperStrand LT Vest - Women's
